title: Can we get the "Extra-void" skins for the void champs as seen in the new "Invasion" game mode?
body: I think that it would be pretty cool for these skins to be released as like 750 RP or 520 RP skins. Some of these champs have very few skins anyways, so why not add more?

replies.body:
Oh hell yes!

They could even call the skin line "Invasion"

Hell yeah I'd love skins like this, as simple as they are. Maybe even make it so you can get a random Invasion skin for free if you do well in the gamemode.

And might as well make it so that if at least 3 people have invasion skins, the Rift Herald gets it too.

Isn't Skarner not from the void?  Also Rek'sai always felt more like a wild void beast than an actual part of the invasion to me, but that could just be me.

Other than that, I love the idea.
I think they should be sold in a chroma bundle. agree they should make them available for purchase as they are super cool
There would be different particle effects and other things that chromas wouldn't have.
